name: Roronoa Zoro
text: On Play: You may rest up to 1 of your "Dressrosa" type Leaders or Stages: KO up to 1 of your opponent's cost 4 or lower characters. Then, place the top 2 cards of your deck into your trash.

effect.text: You may rest up to 1 of your "Dressrosa" type Leaders or Stages: KO up to 1 of your opponent's cost 4 or lower characters. Then, place the top 2 cards of your deck into your trash.
